channel.title: physics on Haozhe Su
channel.description: Recent content in physics on Haozhe Su

item.title: On an integral form for calculating induced electric field
item.description: In this paper, the integral expression for calculating the induced electric field is given by analogy to the Biot-Savart Law. The expression is proved by Helmholtz theorem and Maxwell equations. Based on the method, the paper discussed the distribution of the induced electric field generated by magnetic field in square, triangle and arbitrary polygon area. [View our technical report (in Chinese)] Checkout our MATLAB code
